content: Write a poem about stars where every line starts with the same letter.

Shining brightly in the night,
Stars twinkle with delight.
Silently they watch above,
Secrets held, in heavens' love.

Steadfast in their celestial dance,
Stories told in every glance.
Sparkling like diamonds in the sky,
Symbolizing mysteries up high.

Soaring beyond our earthly bounds,
Signaling to those profound.
Seeking solace in their glow,
Soothing souls below.

Sometimes fading, sometimes bright,
Shifting in the dark of night.
Still, they guide us with their light,
Through the darkest, longest fight.

Shared across ages and lands,
Signs of hope in distant hands.
Starting dreams in young eyes,
Sparking wonder, as it flies.

Stay they do, in timeless grace,
Silent sentinels of space.
So here's to stars, in all their might,
Shining forever, into the night.
